FuncDef:
The realm-location command configures the position of the realm domain name.
The undo realm-location command restores the default configuration.
By default, the realm domain name is before the realm name delimiter.

ParaDef.Info:
Indicates that the realm domain name is behind the realm name delimiter.
-

Indicates that the realm domain name is before the realm name delimiter.
-

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
Here, before-delimiter means left of the domain name delimiter, and after-delimiter means right of the realm name delimiter.
